goals__remit:
I firmly believe in the transformational power of organizations. Whether they are for-profit or not-for-profit, they have a key role to play in the creation of social and corporate value that can – and should – go hand in hand. The leaders in this transition are those who understand the importance of “being connected”: with their own aspirations, with the people around them, and with the organizations and communities to which they contribute. As a consultant and coach, I delight in supporting people to become these sought-after leaders. 
I have been a communication and management consultant for more than 17 years, working with businesses, industrial associations, universities, and government agencies. I combine management-oriented degrees (MSc in Bioengineering and Industrial Marketing) with more people-oriented training (Body-focused Therapist).
